name: APPLUS-ENERGIE
short_description:
The aim of the project is create a learning tools for students. If children become aware of consumption, perhaps they will be able to influence 
and affect a larger system of the school.

Within smart energies, the goal of the monitoring system is the control and management, even remotely, ofconsumption and production of energy users are characterized by complex energy systems.

Requires  DOG - The DOG Operating Ground
